title: Avengers Social Club
resume: This adaptation of the webtoon Buam-dong Revenge Social Club tells the story of three women from very different walks of life - the privileged daughter of a chaebol, a widowed fish market seller, and a housewife - who come together to enact revenge, but discover friendship in the process.
